_sText:
The Alps - Bomb/Defuse by Dimension Studios
http://www.dimensionstudios.org/

Special thanks to the Orion team.
http://www.orion-project.net/

Introduction:
An influencial member of the Senate is sponsoring a resolution to establish a new international system of countering extremism. Supported in a wide range of countries, this resolution has the potential to deliver a serious blow to global terrorism. In an attempt to prevent such resolution from going into effect, a group of terrorists is planning on destroying Senator's recently inherited property in the alps mountains.

Terrorists' mission: 
Destroy the house by planting the C4 in the main house or in the abandoned mine underneath.

Counter-Terrorists' mission: 
Stop the terrorists from destroying the house.

Credits:
Project Director: Aldez
Level Design, Environment art: Aldez, Rickets007
Custom textures: Aldez, Nay0r, Aleksandr
Custom models: Orion team, Aldez, Bubbles
Soundscapes: Aleksandr
Bot navigation mesh: Barndoor

For more, full-sized screenshots please visit http://www.dimensionstudios.org/
